title: In Loving Memory of RT. Hon. Amolo Odinga  1945 – 2025.  A Visionary Leader and Statesman.
summary: The Kenya Railways Board  Management and Staff join the nation in mourning the passing of Rt. Hon. Raila Amolo Odinga a revered statesman  patriot  and visionary leader whose legacy will forever be part of Kenya’s story of progress. The late Rt. Hon. Odinga was a steadfast advocate for national d...
